metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20474 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In readLazyValue of Parcel.java, there is a possible loading of arbitrary code into the System Settings app due to a confused deputy. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-240138294

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
